ComicInfo.Summary:
The battle continues as Lila and Ivan take on the giant, gluttonous witch who means to crush them. Literally.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Dan Mendoza | 1 | | B | Tattered & Torn Cover B, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 2 | | C | Pin-Up Cover C, Limited to 1500 | Marco Maccagni | 3 | | D | Pin-Up Tattered & Torn Cover D, Limited to 2000 | Marco Maccagni | 4 | | E | Pin-Up Cover E, Limited to 1500 | Collette Turner | 5 | | F | Pin-Up Tattered & Torn Cover F, Limited to 2000 | Collette Turner | 6 | | G | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Dan Mendoza | 7 | | H | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Dan Mendoza | 8 |
Note: This issue was released early at San Diego Comic Con (July 19-24, 2017).
ComicInfo.Title: Part Three
